messages.subject: Re: [Unschooling-dotcom] Re: Unschooling as an attractive nuisance ( Kidsbeing with parents )
messages.msgSnippet: ... My daughter s closest friend has said she ll stay away if they get cable TV. It just amazes me that so many people think they can insulate their kids from
messages.messageBody:
>
> We've lost some friends over my children's freedom. People don't
> always want their kids to know how good their lives could possibly
> be. It *is* sad.

My daughter's closest friend has said she'll stay away if they get cable TV.
It just amazes me that so many people think they can insulate their kids
from the popular culture and that it's a good idea. And I've *been* there.
(thinking it's a good idea)
Tia

"They that can give up essential liberty to obtain a little temporary
saftety deserve neither liberty nor safety." Ben Franklin
leschke@...
